long_description: The gray E-Case eSeries(TM) 14 Case has the perfect blend of full functionality with waterproof protection, and it's sized for an array of popular e-readers and 7 in. tablets. Ultra-clear urethane windows allow full use of touch screens, cameras and audio functions. Every case is individually tested to meet IPX7 standard of withstanding submersion in 1m of water for 30 min. 1-step, waterproof SealLock(TM) zipper and rugged RF-welded seams guarantee protection from the elements. PVC-free materials. E-Case eSeries 14 Case has die-cut lash points for tethering. Fits Amazon Kindle Fire(TM), Samsung Galaxy Tab(R) 7.0 & 7.7, Galaxy Nexus(TM) 7, Barnes & Noble NOOK(R), NOOK Tablet(TM) and NOOK Color(TM). Closeout.
short_description: The gray E-Case eSeries(TM) 14 Case has the perfect blend of full functionality with waterproof protection, and it's sized for an array of popular e-readers and 7 in. tablets.
